title: The Jungle IRS
body:
Since we are now farm-nerfed I think its time we increase taxes, the economy is tough and laners must pull their weight. I propose 1-wave:1-gank as a starting point with additions made if its a charity gank and the laner is behind. Any counter-proposals? Laner feedback will be disregarded as is tradition for the Jungle IRS.

{{item:3077}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3748}}

Edit:
Our field representatives {{champion:30}}   and {{champion:27}}  have both reported that they will be personally assisting in the liquidation of laner assets in this deflationary jungle recession.

replies.body: Successful Gank = 2 waves and tower plating

> [{quoted}](name=Frosted Tips,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A5GRG51v,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-01-24T21:56:56.675+0000)
>
> Successful Gank = 2 waves and tower plating

between tower wave-clear meta has begun. we will invade not only jungles but take the waves before they even hit bot
Poxy Junglers I like it.
"Hmmm's" in Singed

> [{quoted}](name=USbetterthanUK,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A5GRG51v,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-01-24T23:37:56.268+0000)
>
> between tower wave-clear meta has begun. we will invade not only jungles but take the waves before they even hit bot

yeah I play singed too
Then stop taking ignite as your summonner spell and come back with teleport. Oh wait.

Riot made Jungle too impactful and now you are all use to that so are crying about getting put back in your place.

Jungle is suppose to be behind in level vs Laners and so needs items to gank and so you would not see a gain until 8-10m into a game.   This is how it was (not counting the afk farm 30m then kill everyone of S4)

> [{quoted}](name=XXXMurderPenguin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A5GRG51v,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-01-25T00:41:07.487+0000)
>
> Riot made Jungle too impactful and now you are all use to that so are crying about getting put back in your place.
> 
> Jungle is suppose to be behind in level vs Laners and so needs items to gank and so you would not see a gain until 8-10m into a game.   This is how it was (not counting the afk farm 30m then kill everyone of S4)

And laners are still going to flame us for not ganking their lane, then hide under turret when we do show up so we can get killed by the laner that's 2 levels above us and whom they've already fed 2-3 kills at 10 minutes in.

> [{quoted}](name=Akheteru,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A5GRG51v,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2019-01-25T01:01:50.031+0000)
>
> And laners are still going to flame us for not ganking their lane, then hide under turret when we do show up so we can get killed by the laner that's 2 levels above us and whom they've already fed 2-3 kills at 10 minutes in.

Under-tower tax penalty is 3 waves.

> [{quoted}](name=XXXMurderPenguin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A5GRG51v,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-01-25T00:41:07.487+0000)
>
> Riot made Jungle too impactful and now you are all use to that so are crying about getting put back in your place.
> 
> Jungle is suppose to be behind in level vs Laners and so needs items to gank and so you would not see a gain until 8-10m into a game.   This is how it was (not counting the afk farm 30m then kill everyone of S4)

I'm not crying, I enjoy toxic gameplay and will especially enjoy heavy taxation!

> [{quoted}](name=XXXMurderPenguin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A5GRG51v,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-01-25T00:41:07.487+0000)
>
> Riot made Jungle too impactful and now you are all use to that so are crying about getting put back in your place.
> 
> Jungle is suppose to be behind in level vs Laners and so needs items to gank and so you would not see a gain until 8-10m into a game.   This is how it was (not counting the afk farm 30m then kill everyone of S4)

Wait wait wait always must be behind in levels?

No matter how I am doing my job I still must fall behind?

Well ok.

> [{quoted}](name=XXXMurderPenguin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A5GRG51v,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-01-25T00:41:07.487+0000)
>
> Riot made Jungle too impactful and now you are all use to that so are crying about getting put back in your place.
> 
> Jungle is suppose to be behind in level vs Laners and so needs items to gank and so you would not see a gain until 8-10m into a game.   This is how it was (not counting the afk farm 30m then kill everyone of S4)

Yes so know that farming is pointless, instead of farming junglers you get more early gank junglers, doing the exact opposite of the riot intentions  nerf to xp
Sounds good to me. Let’s do it.
We provide a protection racket service with fees that vary based on our champion, this is the meta riot chose.
So you want me to give up my waves when you just happen to walk to it, didnt secure a kill or take their flash. Let me guess you still want the waves even if you get the kill right?

> [{quoted}](name=Malix Farwin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A5GRG51v,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2019-01-25T11:52:33.379+0000)
>
> So you want me to give up my waves when you just happen to walk to it, didnt secure a kill or take their flash. Let me guess you still want the waves even if you get the kill right?

Not exactly, we are saying that we will take your waves whenever we walk into them since we are the IRS. The jungle economy is currently in a recession so we have to raise taxes. Thank you for understanding. 

{{champion:30}}
Gonna start running {{item:3097}} on top laners and telling my jungler “come top and take this whole wave” out of sympathy.
\#notmyjungler

In all seriousness is anyone gonna try taking relic shield? {{champion:64}} Extra ward hops plus free cannons

If you went from lane, to lane, to lane and took a cannon from each, how much exp and gold would you get? Actually curious

I will  land permatop whit my support yi whit ignite and relic shield.....IT WILL BE WONDERFULL.

INBEFORE PLS  DONT REPORT IF YOU MEET A  YI SUPP WHIT IGNITE AND RELIC ON TOP ITS LEGIT.
1 wave plus 1 smited canon minion for a succesful gank is alright i think.and if u get invaded by the enemy jungle and ur mid doesnt do anything i would recommend taking 1 wave and 1 tower plating
Do you still take an entire wave if the support owns (but doesn't operate) a houseboat in a foreign country, or is that a deduction?

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A5GRG51v,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-01-24T23:50:31.447+0000)
>
> Do you still take an entire wave if the support owns (but doesn't operate) a houseboat in a foreign country, or is that a deduction?

In strange cases such as that we may have to clear the enemy wave and take a shield plating with demolish, but only while botlane is back/out of range.

> [{quoted}](name=USbetterthanUK,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A5GRG51v,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2019-01-24T23:52:43.595+0000)
>
> In strange cases such as that we may have to clear the enemy wave and take a shield plating with demolish, but only while botlane is back/out of range.

WTF? Ugh; I'll just let H&R Creep Block handle it this year.
